turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good afternoon, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I would like to order the iced black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure which Starbucks would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to pick up from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like any whipped cream or syrups?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kind of set ups do you have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Vanilla, Caramel, Cinnamon dolce, Hazelnut, Toffee nut, Peppermint, Raspberry, Classic (sugar/simple syrup).

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I want to add the sugar syrup and wood cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a grande iced black and white mocha with whipped cream and sugar syrup from the Starbucks on forest road.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct. Can I get that with skim milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. Anything else for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Your order will be ready in 15 minutes and you'll get the reciept via mobile.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Thank you very much.
